 2019-05722019-05-21,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActCurrency Act
SubjectOrder Calling in Certain Notes
PrecisOrder Calling in CERTAIN NOTES in order to (1) contribute to the reduction of illicit transactions using Canadian bank notes; (2) reduce counterfeiting of Canadian bank notes; and (3) increase confidence in the integrity and security of Canadian bank notes in circulation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0146 Publication Date: 2019-05-29
